name: Music_5247.wav
keywords: ['mediterranean folk', 'romantic', 'nostalgic', 'soft', 'no vocals', 'reverb electric guitar solo', 'eastern drums', 'slow tempo', 'ambience vocal choir']
caption: The track is a mediterranean folk song and features a main melodic element which is a clean electric guitar playing a romantic melody. Eastern sounding drums play a slow tempo pattern that adds to the romantic aura of the song. The atmosphere is nostalgic and evokes romance. In the background there's a choir that sings an ambience melody.
